$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-switcher/Dar.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-switcher/DarkLightStartup
$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-switcher/Dar.text:
!! ~ControlPanel Palette

Manual dark / light switching can be done in the $:/ControlPanel ''-> Appearence -> Palette'' tab or with the configuration below.

The following settings will be used to switch between light and dark palettes.

* The defaults can be changed using the palette {{$:/core/images/palette|1em}} button
* Select a palette-preview to activate it
* Automatic selection can be configured using [[custom actions|$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-switcher/readme]]

{{$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-switcher/settings}}

!! Palette Modes Detection

Actions tagged <<tag $:/tags/StartupAction/Browser>> are executed when the wiki is started. More info can be found at StartupActions and examples here.

!!! Examples

Examples, how to handle dark / light events can be found at: [[DarkLightStartup (Examples)|$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-switcher/DarkLightStartup (Examples)]]

{{$:/plugins/wikilabs/palette-switcher/DarkLightStartup-status}}
